map_mods module

map_mods.create_array(inputdir)[source]

This method creates an array of the file listings.

Parameters

inputdir (str) – The input directory

Returns

An array of the file listings

Return type

arrary

map_mods.create_mapfile(mapname, inputdir, outputdir, farr)[source]

This method creates a DITA topic map.

Parameters

  • mapname (str) – The map name

  • inputdir (str) – The input directory

  • outputdir (str) – The output directory

  • farr (arr) – The array of files

map_mods.create_topics(mapname, inputdir, outputdir, farr)[source]

This method creates DITA topics with tables.

Parameters

  • mapname (str) – The map name

  • inputdir (str) – The input directory

  • outputdir (str) – The output directory

  • farr (arr) – The array of files
